rules.description: Use Space as a special modifier key (Required)
Cancel modifier (Space) with L-Shift
Disable modifier (Space) with Space + R-Shift + Escape
Enable modifier (Space) with R-Shift + Escape
Space + { E / F / D / S } = Up / Right / Down / Left
Space + { W / R } = Page Up / Down
Space + { A / G } = Prev / Next Word
Space + { Q / T } = Line Start / End (app: terminal)
Space + { Q / T } = Line Start / End (app: others)
Space + { I / L / K / J } = Select Up / Right / Down / Left
Space + { O / U } = Indent / Outdent
Space + { N / M } = Backspace / Delete
Space + B = Delete Word
Space + { Z / X / C / V } = Undo / Cut / Copy / Paste
Space + { 2 / 3 } = Left / Right Tab
Space + { 1 / 4 } = Close / Open Tab
Space + { Control + Q / Control + W } = Go Back / Forward (app: filemanager)
Space + { Control + Q / Control + W } = Go Back / Forward (app: browser)
Space + L-Control = Numpad Mode (N=1, K=5, O=9)
Space + { P / Shift + P } = Plus / Minus
Space + Slash = Backslash
Space + Quote = Backtick
Space + Hyphen = Tilde
Space + 7 = Pipe
Space + Semicolon = Equal Sign
Space + Tab = Enter
Space + Period = Underscore
Space + Custom Keys
Caps Lock = L-Control / Escape
Left Control = L-Control / Escape
Space + { 9 / 0 } = Mouse Mode On / Off (on)
Space + { 9 / 0 } = Mouse Mode On / Off (off)
(Mouse) Quote / Semicolon = Mouse Speed Up / Down (mouse mode: on)
(Mouse) Quote / Semicolon = Mouse Speed Up / Down (thumb on touchpad)
(Mouse) E / F / D / S = Move Mouse Up / Right / Down / Left (mouse mode: on)
(Mouse) E / F / D / S = Move Mouse Up / Right / Down / Left (thumb on touchpad)
(Mouse) J / H / L = Mouse Buttons Left / Middle / Right (mouse mode: on)
(Mouse) J / H / L = Mouse Buttons Left / Middle / Right (thumb on touchpad)
(Mouse) I / K = Mouse Wheel Up / Down (mouse mode: on)
(Mouse) I / K = Mouse Wheel Up / Down (thumb on touchpad)
(Mouse) U / O = Mouse Wheel Left / Right (mouse mode: on)
(Mouse) U / O = Mouse Wheel Left / Right (thumb on touchpad)
(Mouse) N / M = Left/Right Tab (mouse mode: on)
(Mouse) N / M = Left/Right Tab (thumb on touchpad)
(Mouse) B / Comma = Close / Open Tab (mouse mode: on)
(Mouse) B / Comma = Close / Open Tab (thumb on touchpad)
(Mouse) Y / P = Go Back / Forward (app: filemanager) (mouse mode: on)
(Mouse) Y / P = Go Back / Forward (app: filemanager) (thumb on touchpad)
(Mouse) Y / P = Go Back / Forward (app: browser) (mouse mode: on)
(Mouse) Y / P = Go Back / Forward (app: browser) (thumb on touchpad)
